name: team-finder
description: Finds NHL teams based on given text

scripts.build: babel lib -d tmp --presets es2015,stage-2 && babel index.js -d tmp --presets es2015,stage-2 && uglifyjs tmp/ --compress --mangle --output dist/index.js
